text: Novyye Burly () is a rural locality (a village) in Tabynsky Selsoviet, Gafuriysky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 73 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 30 km from Krasnousolsky, 8 km from Tabynskoye. == References == Category:Rural localities in Gafuriysky District
title: Novyye Burly
